pr_title: Update DpdkDriverImpl.java to support DPDK trunk interfaces

timeline.message:
Update DpdkDriverImpl.java

Update to support trunk interfaces for DPDK enabled hosts.

timeline.bodyText: could you put only this vland_mode and tag in the if-block and the rest around it. The other parts of the string do not depend on the condition and there is nothing that should go in the else-block.
timeline.author: DaanHoogland
nvazquez

replies.bodyText: removed the white spaces on the blank line.
